website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and sturdy, with plenty of storage beneath the extra-wide carrier seat, kids look forward to pushing their dolls around in this jogger stroller.
pros: Jogger-style stroller is huge compared to similar stroller accessories
Swiveling wheels make maneuvering much easier
cons: May be a little too big for younger toddlers

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this stroller!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute stroller! The seat is wider than other doll strollers which is nice, so they can put more than one doll in it. The front swivel wheels make it SO much easier for my daughters to maneuver than strollers without the front swiveling wheels. Just for reference, my almost 5 year old is about 42 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Folds up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and convenient little baby stroller. It folds down so we can put it away when shes not playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Shreve

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for my little toddler
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect! My daughter received another doll stroller for Christmas but the front wheel wouldn’t turn and it was so frustrating, she could only go straight and would get upset when it wouldn’t turn. This one is compact, durable, and the turning front wheel makes all the difference in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Woldai

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters baby alive doll over christmas. It is perfect as far as a toy stroller goes.. but unfortunately the seat itself has ripped and is completely ruined therefore cannot even be used now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it twice
customer_reviews.text: It’s to lightweight. It keeps rolling over when my toddler is pushing it. I usually end up carrying it most of the way. She really doesn’t have any enthusiasm for walking her dolls because of the struggle.
customer_reviews.author: susan colarossi

customer_reviews.title: NOT TWO YEAR OLD FRIENDLY! MUST READ!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Until my 7 year old decided to put my 2 year old niece in and go for a ride across the divider between a sliding glass door and the patio at their grandparents house. The front wheel hinge popped leaving the stroller leaning forward a little. But other then that it still goes and the dolls are strapped in before moving so we are good.
customer_reviews.author: Latasia Capers

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: By far the cutest baby stroller I’ve purchased! Assembly was easy! And is the right size for my 4 year old , even my 7 year old can reach it ! This one is a must
customer_reviews.author: Veronica L.Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Bad box and material was.ripped
customer_reviews.text: When we recieved the box the box was all.smashed in and on one side was partly.open. that should.of been my first clue. Then once.i.put.it.together.the material.part had a big.rip.in it. If my daughter hadnt of been standing there so.excited for her new.baby stroller I would.of sent it back. Luckily it can be sewed however for.40.00.you shouldn't have to sew something that you just.took out of the box...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Meltabarger

customer_reviews.title: sure she will love it!
customer_reviews.text: For my granddaughter for her birthday....sure she will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Price to high
customer_reviews.text: The price was too high but it was for my granddaughter and she love it.😊
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this stroller! It was very easy to put together and she loves taking her dolls for a walk. I am sure she will get many hours of playtime with this doll stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got my daughter this stroller for Christmas and a couple weeks later one of the back wheels broke.
customer_reviews.author: YVONNIZIA

customer_reviews.title: Lil mommies and daddies delight
customer_reviews.text: Daughter (4) loves this. Easy to maneuver. Brother (2) cant climb into seat with rail which is a definite plus as he broke the last toy stroller. Daughter suggests a cup holder for the next stroller...maybe an upgrade in the future?
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Back wheels aren’t secure
customer_reviews.text: Back wheels don’t stay on because they aren’t secured in any way. We’re going to have to figure out a way to glue them or attach them somehow to the bar because they keep sliding off as my daughter pushes it around. Huge bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter who’s going on 5 years old. Right height and very sturdy compared to other toy strollers. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Channing

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is too small. I would only recommend it for a 2-3 year old. Our grandaughter is 5yrs. But has a babyalive doll.
customer_reviews.author: jill venditti

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 2 1/2 and considered a little tall for her age. This was the perfect size for her with room to grow into! She loves it! Was also having a difficult time finding doll accessories to fit all of her dolls and all of their sizes. Her biggest baby doll fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: shannon mciver

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller
customer_reviews.text: She loves her stroller! Its the best stroller I’ve paid for unlike the other brands. It’s just like the real one
customer_reviews.author: constance rucker

customer_reviews.title: Doll toy stroller is made with strong material and wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Baby Alive Lifestyle Stroller Toy was a birthday gift for my three year old granddaughter. She plays with it everyday. Her older sister who will be 5 in Oct wants one for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry D

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Seems sturdy, but we have only had it since Christmas so time will tell! Easy for a toddler to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Even my 7 year old has fun with it
customer_reviews.text: My princess loves this stroller. Even my 7 year old has fun with it. It’s the perfect height and runs smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Lipstreet2

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve opened it when I got, but it was for Christmas so I just put it up. Missing rod to hold the back tires on.
customer_reviews.author: STEPH

customer_reviews.title: I love it but hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together but very hard to fold. A child could never fold it down by themselves, i thought it was going to break as i was folding it down. But other than that my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: ShaKella Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 2 year old. Easy to put together. She loves it and has used it just about every day since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: C Sowder

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my twins and we love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 starts for this stroller I really Love it my daughter love it too she is very ...
customer_reviews.text: 10 starts for this stroller I really Love it my daughter love it too she is very happy thanks ❤️😘🙏
customer_reviews.author: Aleyda polanco

customer_reviews.title: Love This Jogger Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great! It resembles the real thing while offering bright colors that kids love. Assembly was a breeze and it pushes like a dream. It's lightweight enough that our 2 1/2 year old can wrangle it everywhere. The basket and canopy are nice touches that kids love. Overall, awesome stroller!
customer_reviews.author: 4649miranda

customer_reviews.title: Adorable doll stroller for girls!
customer_reviews.text: *I received a sample product Our daughter is 2 and is going to absolutely love this doll stroller. She has several different dolls in various sizes and many will fit this stroller and she is going to have a fun time playing with it. She will be getting it for Christmas, so she has not seen this yet. This makes for the perfect gift for little girls who enjoy playing with their dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and looks like a real life stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is significantly nicer than others I've purchased. I bought this for my 3 year old daughter so loves to wheel her dolls around in it on the sidewalk and the driveway. It was easy to assemble and looks like a real life stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller my granddaughter loves this for her dolls, although she hasn’t tried to sit in this yet it seems to be quite sturdy and was easy to put together by her 7yr old sister-with dad overseeing it all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 18 mo toddlers
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble. Looks as on the picture. The swivel wheel makes it easy to push and turn. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: I. Li

customer_reviews.title: Love this jogger!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jogging stroller!! Our 3 1/2 year old has so much fun wheeling around her dolls and babbies! It wheels very nicely and the colors and print are fun for kids! Love all the features!! Great stroller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Lifestyle Stroller Toy
product_meta.description: Take a jog with your baby alive in the baby alive lifestyle stroller. The jogger style doll stroller is a stylish yet functional. This stroller folds easy for storage, includes shopping basket, retractable canopy and front swivel wheel. Over 25" tall and can hold any of your baby dolls.
feature_bullets: Doll stroller with a comfortable foam handle
stroller includes canopy, three point harness and storage basket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
